name: Sneak&Steal
description:
What's The Game?🕵️‍♂️
🥋it's an 'Intentionally Crappy' stealth Game!🥋
Your a Theft Going around town Robbing People!-----------------------------------------------------------
But being a Thief isnt always a Breeze. the Swat officer's are Patrolling around!👮
You need a Certain amount of money Before your Gonna Leave!💰The Roadmap📰
- New Map's Every Month!🗺️
- New Security System's!📸
- Updates To Existing Map's!📲And Much more!

More Coming Soon!
